sources.name: sourceProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceProduct

sinks.name: sink
sinks.script:
Window1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink

transformations.name: Window1
transformations.script:
sourceProduct window(over(Color),
	desc(StandardCost, false),
	denseRankStandardCost = denseRank(StandardCost)) ~> Window1
